name: Silkstream
description:
Silkstream

Built for MiniJam 123

By: ByteCraft, ST0CKCVB3, Unspec

There is no ground!

Try to stay on your web for as long as possible and eat flies for extra points!

Wasps will attack you and your web! Avoid them and make sure that they don't take out the one you're stood on!

Controls

Use right click to move towards the mouse cursor and left click to fire a new web!

Space allows you to drop down from your web and latch onto a new one. (Can be useful for if you get stuck in an intersection)

(WASD controls are available but picking a web at an intersection is very difficult)
